name: Into the Unknown (itch) (just.some.chars)
description:
Into the Unknown

Construct an impassable strategy. Defeat the fundamental forces of the universe. Nothing or nobody will help you. Reach the roots. Do not give up. Reflect. Persevere.

‘‘Everything you’ll ever need to know is within you; the secrets of the universe are imprinted on the cells of your body.’’
Dan Millman Credits

Into the Unknown was created as a Global Game Jam 2023 entry.

  • Emre Özcan
  • Ahmet Eren Erkek
  • Eren Gökçe
  • Tuna Oruç
  • Tolga Ersan
  • Gülce Belge
